---
output: 
  pdf_document:
    includes:
      in_header: header.tex
---

To add header images to an Rmarkdown, you need a separate latex file, header.tex. The header.tex file for this report is shown below. Note, using engine='bash' in a knitr chunk header allows you to run and see bash commands!

```{r engine='bash', echo=FALSE}

cat header.tex

```
